tool_description: Manages user authentication with support for JWT tokens, password hashing, session management, and role-based access control.

auth_method.description: Authentication method: jwt, session, oauth, basic

password_policy.description: Password strength policy: weak, medium, strong

roles.description: Available user roles for access control

error_messages: Invalid authentication method: Use one of [jwt, session, oauth, basic]
Invalid token expiry: Must be between 15 and 10080 minutes
Invalid password policy: Use one of [weak, medium, strong]
Empty roles array: Provide at least one role when using role-based access
usage: Select auth_method and configure token_expiry, password_policy, and roles as needed. Enable refresh_tokens for enhanced security.
